description: Amendments to planning permission dated 08.06.2022 (RN: 21/07082/FULL) for, 'Alterations to 6 Charles Street to include the erection of a single storey mansard roof extension and changes to the fenestration on Hays Mews elevation, partial demolition and rebuilding of 1 Hay's Mews and amalgamation with 6 Charles Street; all to enlarge existing flats (Class C3). Creation of a courtyard at rear ground floor level of 1 Hay's Mews and a terrace to the rear of 6 Charles Street at fifth floor level, installation of green roof areas to the main roof of 1 Hay's Mews and the rear of 6 Charles Street at part fifth floor level'. [SITE INCLUDES 1 HAY'S MEWS]. Namely, internal alterations to the apartment layouts; alterations to the front elevation of 1 Hays Mews; inclusion of new service risers; alterations to the entrance door and fanlight of 6 Charles Street; amendments to the window fenestration to both the mews internal lightwell and the Hays Mews return elevation of 6 Charles Street; alterations to building materials; cleaning of facades; inclusion of rooflight to the mews roof; inclusion of a mansafe system to the green roof areas; installation of a smoke extract vent over the main stair at roof level.
